short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension untuk Pusat Rujukan Persuratan Melayu daripada Dewan Bahasa dan Pustaka

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get official definition of words from official Dewan Bahasa dan Pustaka's Pusat Rujukan Persuratan Melayu (PRPM).

Step to use:
1. Highlight word
2. Click on "Cari Maksud" or right click and click "Cari ..."
3. The definition will popup on righ side of your screen
